citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:20 p.m. on
10/20/2015. The inspector knocked at the door, called the phone number provided and waited 30 minutes on the
property.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:20 p.m. on
10/20/2015. The inspector knocked at the door, called the phone number provided and waited 30 minutes on the
property.
